title: The Future of Industrial Design: AI-Powered Innovation
description: Explore how AI is revolutionizing industrial design, from automated design processes to intelligent material selection. This post delves into real-world applications, emerging trends, and the impact of AI on designers' creativity and efficiency.
author: Johan GrundstÃ¶rm Eriksson

body.raw: Blog posts have their own pages. The content source is a markdown file, parsed to HTML by Contentlayer.
